because you're not getting

1317.47.text:

1327.23.text:

1363.34.text:
that is non-personal, non-human,

1373.58.text:
that we draw upon

1376.14.text:

1383.37.text:
And this might

1394.98.text:
in our cities,

1417.31.text:
And they can have

1419.87.text:
on people who may be at

or watching a protest,

1424.35.text:
marking we were

1434.87.text:

1450.41.text:
when Martin Luther King

1462.12.text:
that we could work

1473.69.text:
